about_the_policy: This is a top-up policy with Individual sum insured
for_whom: For Individuals & Family (with Individual SI) (Family means - 2A + 3C)
what_is_defined_limit: Defined Limit means the limit of covered medical expenses up to which the company will not be liable during the policy period
payment_of_claim: Under this policy claim gets paid only when the aggregate of covered medical expenses exceed the defined limit in a policy year

basic_covers.day_care_procedures: All day care procedures are covered up to the sum insured
basic_covers.air_ambulance: Covered up to 10% of SI (available for SI of Rs.7 Lac and above)

option_for_migration.available_after: 5 policy yrs with continuity benefits (subject to Underwriting approval)
conditions: If the Person insured with the Company under this policy before 50 yrs and have been continuously renewed without any break
No claim has been made during the immediately preceding 5 years
The proposer should exercise this option for all the insured persons
This policy shall not be further renewed if the option is exercised

delivery_expenses: Covered up to Rs.50,000/- per policy year (waiting period 1 year)
wellness_services: Can be availed from our Mobile App ‘Star Power’ & Customer Portal
